## unpackFloat3() function

Decompresses the three floats that was compressed to R11F\_G11F\_B10F format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function unpackFloat3<T extends number[] | Float32Array<ArrayBuffer>>(pk: number, result: T): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

pk


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The compressed value


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

result


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

A float array that will store the decompressed floats


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
